name: Not a Discord Theme v2
custom_css:
:root {
  --custom-theme-style-inputs: [
  {
    "type": "color",
    "varId": "NSDDrawer-IconColor",
    "displayText": "Drawer icons Color",
    "default": "rgba(237, 237, 237, 1)"
  },
  {
    "type": "color",
    "varId": "NSDSmartThemeBGColor",
    "displayText": "Theme Background",
    "default": "rgba(18, 18, 20, 1)"
  },
  {
    "type": "color",
    "varId": "NSDsmartThemeHiglitesColor",
    "displayText": "Theme Higlites Color",
    "default": "rgba(77, 80, 91, 0.5)"
  },
  {
    "type": "slider",
    "varId": "NSDlistGrid-char-panel-width",
    "displayText": "Grid char panel width",
    "default": "482",
    "min": 240,
    "max": 740,
    "step": 1
  },
  {
    "type": "slider",
    "varId": "NSDnormal-char-panel-width",
    "displayText": "Normal panel width",
    "default": "340",
    "min": 240,
    "max": 740,
    "step": 1
  },
  {
    "type": "slider",
    "varId": "NSDbgImageOpacity",
    "displayText": "Bg Image Opacity",
    "default": "1",
    "min": 0,
    "max": 1,
    "step": 0.01
  },
  {
    "type": "slider",
    "varId": "NSDAnimation-duration",
    "displayText": "Animation duration",
    "default": "0",
    "min": 0,
    "max": 2,
    "step": 0.01
  },
  {
    "type": "slider",
    "varId": "NSDexpressionWidth",
    "displayText": "Expression Width",
    "default": "512",
    "min": 240,
    "max": 740,
    "step": 1
  }
]
}
